channel.title: CVE Feed for Store Locator Plus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Store Locator Plus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-24289|2024-08-03T19:28:23.205Z -- store%20locator%20plus -- store%20locator%20plus%20for%20wordpress
item.description: There is functionality in the Store Locator Plus for WordPress plugin through 5.5.14 that made it possible for authenticated users to update their user meta data to become an administrator on any site using the plugin.
